response.overview: Joaquín (Fele Martínez), a young journalist who lives with his girlfriend in Barcelona, has to move to a southern town to investigate a mysterious death, that of José (Samuel Segura), who died while being detained under mysterious circumstances. Joaquín will learn the facts through the different versions of some people who knew José, and will try to reconstruct them and discover the truth. Meanwhile, Joaquín's boss demands that he publish the most lurid details of the case first. His girlfriend Patricia (Ingrid Rubio) will not know what to do when the journalist disappears.
response.title: Los minutos del silencio
